DOC.brief_summary: Recurrent aphthous stomatitis is a difficult to treat and quite common chronic inflammatory disease of the oral mucosa. This study evaluates the fluid extract from Chamomilla recutita's safety and effectiveness in treatment of aphthous stomatitis .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of Fluid Extract of Chamomilla Tincture for Oral Aphthae
